memberdef.name: POCKETSPHINX_OPTIONS
memberdef.initializer: waveform_to_cepstral_command_line_macro(), \ cepstral_to_feature_command_line_macro(), \ POCKETSPHINX_ACMOD_OPTIONS, \ POCKETSPHINX_BEAM_OPTIONS, \ POCKETSPHINX_SEARCH_OPTIONS, \ POCKETSPHINX_DICT_OPTIONS, \ POCKETSPHINX_NGRAM_OPTIONS, \ POCKETSPHINX_FSG_OPTIONS, \ POCKETSPHINX_KWS_OPTIONS, \ POCKETSPHINX_DEBUG_OPTIONS

briefdescription.para: Minimal set of command-line options for PocketSphinx.

memberdef.name: POCKETSPHINX_DEBUG_OPTIONS
memberdef.initializer: { "-logfn", \ ARG_STRING, \ NULL, \ "File to write log messages in" }, \ { "-debug", \ ARG_INT32, \ NULL, \ "Verbosity level for debugging messages" }, \ { "-mfclogdir", \ ARG_STRING, \ NULL, \ "Directory to log feature files to" \ }, \ { "-rawlogdir", \ ARG_STRING, \ NULL, \ "Directory to log raw audio files to" }, \ { "-senlogdir", \ ARG_STRING, \ NULL, \ "Directory to log senone score files to" \ }

briefdescription.para: Options defining beam width parameters for tuning the search.
Options defining other parameters for tuning the search.

memberdef.name: POCKETSPHINX_KWS_OPTIONS
memberdef.initializer: { "-keyphrase", \ ARG_STRING, \ NULL, \ "Keyphrase to spot"}, \ { "-kws", \ ARG_STRING, \ NULL, \ "A file with keyphrases to spot, one per line"}, \ { "-kws_plp", \ ARG_FLOAT64, \ "1e-1", \ "Phone loop probability for keyword spotting" }, \ { "-kws_delay", \ ARG_INT32, \ "10", \ "Delay to wait for best detection score" }, \ { "-kws_threshold", \ ARG_FLOAT64, \ "1", \ "Threshold for p(hyp)/p(alternatives) ratio" }

memberdef.name: POCKETSPHINX_FSG_OPTIONS
memberdef.initializer: { "-fsg", \ ARG_STRING, \ NULL, \ "Sphinx format finite state grammar file"}, \ { "-jsgf", \ ARG_STRING, \ NULL, \ "JSGF grammar file" }, \ { "-toprule", \ ARG_STRING, \ NULL, \ "Start rule for JSGF (first public rule is default)" }, \ { "-fsgusealtpron", \ ARG_BOOLEAN, \ "yes", \ "Add alternate pronunciations to FSG"}, \ { "-fsgusefiller", \ ARG_BOOLEAN, \ "yes", \ "Insert filler words at each state."}

briefdescription.para: Command-line options for finite state grammars.
Command-line options for statistical language models.

memberdef.name: POCKETSPHINX_DICT_OPTIONS
memberdef.initializer: { "-dict", \ REQARG_STRING, \ NULL, \ "Main pronunciation dictionary (lexicon) input file" }, \ { "-fdict", \ ARG_STRING, \ NULL, \ "Noise word pronunciation dictionary input file" }, \ { "-dictcase", \ ARG_BOOLEAN, \ "no", \ "Dictionary is case sensitive (NOTE: case insensitivity applies to ASCII characters only)" } \
